display.description: Ghost is an open source publishing platform which is beautifully designed, easy to use, and free for everyone.

base.name: ghost
base.installation_report: Goto to _Engines_Builder(http_protocol)://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)/ghost/setup/ and follow the instructions

start.content:
#!/bin/bash
PID_FILE=/home/engines/run/pid
export PID_FILE

. /home/engines/functions/trap.sh

cd /home/app


ghost start
startup_complete
while ! test -f /home/engines/run/flags/sig_term
 do
 sleep 10&
 echo $! > /home/engines/run/pid
 wait
done

ghost stop


shutdown_complete

exit

post_install.content:
#!/bin/bash
cd /home/app

ghost install   --url _Engines_Builder(http_protocol)://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)\
                --admin-url https://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)/ \
                --port 9001 \
                --ip 0.0.0.0 \
                --db mysql \
                --dbhost $dbhost \
                --dbuser $dbuser \
                --dbpass $dbpasswd \
                --dbname $dbname \
                --mail smtp \
                --mailhost _Engines_System(smtp_host) \
                --mailport 25 \
                -l 
                
                
 cp config.development.json config.production.json
